definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: We use a software and send a tsunami warning.
sentences.chinese: 我們利用軟件發佈海嘯預警。

sentences.english: It treats prices like earthquakes or tsunamis, nature acting beyond the power of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 價格就像是地震或海嘯，這些自然現象是超乎人力的。

sentences.english: The tsunami that followed engulfed the northeast and wiped out entire towns.
sentences.chinese: 隨後的海嘯淹沒了日本東北，吞沒了整個城鎮。

sentences.english: Given those variations, tsunami experts warned that predicting wave heights was difficult.
sentences.chinese: 考慮到這些變量，海嘯專家們說浪高會很難預測。

sentences.english: It is a legend would be a landslide tsunami wave tail.
sentences.chinese: 傳奇它一晃動尾巴就會山崩海嘯。

sentences.english: The tsunami and earthquake have done terrible damage to Tohoku.
sentences.chinese: 海嘯和地震已經對東北部造成嚴重的損害。

sentences.english: Has Chateau Pichon Baron been affected by the global financial crisis recently?
sentences.chinese: 全球性的金融海嘯對於碧尚男爵堡有何影響？

sentences.english: The tsunami warning was subsequently cancelled at 23:45 UTC.
sentences.chinese: 後來在世界標準時間23點45分，海嘯預警被取消。

sentences.english: We understand it was an enormous earthquake and tsunami.
sentences.chinese: 我們理解這是一場大地震和海嘯。

sentences.english: While aftershocks from theearthquake continued, the tsunami wreaked the most damage.
sentences.chinese: 雖然震後餘震不斷，海嘯纔是最殘暴的苦主。

sentences.english: A string of coastal towns and villages were flattened by a tsunami triggered by the quake.
sentences.chinese: 沿線的海岸城市及鄉村都被地震引起的海嘯所填平。

sentences.english: It more or less goes perpendicular with the fault rupture of the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 海嘯的行進方向與地震斷層破裂帶通常會相互垂直。

sentences.english: Those tsunami victims are in evacuation centers.
sentences.chinese: 海嘯的受害者們現在都在避難所裏。

sentences.english: Since the outbreak of the financial crisis, Greenspan has been roundly criticized.
sentences.chinese: 金融海嘯爆發以來，葛老飽受批評。

sentences.english: Fifty-five minutes later, however, they were swamped by the tsunami that followed the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 但是，25分鐘之後，它被地震後的海嘯淹沒。

sentences.english: Fukushima Prefecture and the Japan Meteorological Agency has issued a tsunami warning, Ibaraki Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 日本氣象廳已向福島縣以及茨城縣發佈海嘯警報。

definition: storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
